title: REVIEW --- Play: News Quiz
text:

C. Rhode Island

D. Ohio

---

2. What's the latest diet craze?

A. Cannibalism

B. High carbs

C. Fruitarian

D. Microbiome-customized meal plans

---

3. The newest release in a big Hollywood series produced boffo box office. Which series?

A. Periodontists Amok

B. Fast & Furious

C. Star Wars

D. Wallace and Gromit

---

4. Which Mexican billionaire urged people to buy bitcoin?

A. Carlos Slim

B. Ricardo Salinas Pliego

C. Maria Asuncion Aramburuzabala

D. Juan Francisco Beckmann Vidal

---

5. What did Xi Jinping wear while giving an address to mark the centennial of China's Communist Party?

A. His usual dark suit and tie

B. A red tangzhuang

C. A gray Mao suit

D. A made-in-China Los Angeles Dodgers cap

---

6. Who asked that new FTC Chairwoman Lina Khan recuse herself from antitrust investigations of the company?

A. Amazon

B. Facebook

C. Google

D. All of the above

---

7. At a public event, Sen. Chuck Grassley, 87, did pushups to demonstrate his vitality. Who's the oldest member of the Senate?

A. Dianne Feinstein

B. Bernie Sanders

C. Patrick Leahy

D. Chuck Grassley

---

8. Leonard Lauder, author of a new memoir, was interviewed about his mother, beauty entrepreneur Estee Lauder. What was her original name?

A. Estelle Laverne Mester

B. Josephine Ester Mentzer

C. Josephine Esther Elliott

D. Devon Elliott

---

9. What's likely to cool the blistering pace of U.S. new-car sales?

A. A shortage of financing

B. A shortage of salespeople

C. A shortage of vehicles

D. A resurgent pandemic fueled by the Delta variant

---

ANSWERS

1. A

2. D

3. B

4. B

5. C

6. A

7. A

8. B

9. C
